hero.core_tension: Balancing an opening‑weekend loyalty acquisition push (S1) against post‑visit outreach cadence (S2) and discount/partner funding tradeoffs (S3, S4) — show the decision window where a pop‑up must choose acquisition intensity vs broader discounting.
hero.setting: Interior holiday pop‑up stall, brushed-metal counter, soft merch drapery; 3/4 angle, foreground hands and midground operator, clean negative space behind.
hero.persona: Floor operator and studio lead collaborating — operator in branded apron, studio lead with rolled paper playbook and sample cards.
hero.action: Preparing physical loyalty signup cards and stacking partner rebate tokens while exchanging a timed cue — a cooperative calibration between operator and studio.
hero.urgency_symbol: Layered light bands or narrowing ribbons of shadow across the counter that imply a shrinking decision window (symbolic timing, not a clock).
props: loyalty signup cards and printed cohort labels (S1)
micro‑rebate redeemable cards for value offers (S4)
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting with confident highlights, soft rim light on subjects, deep but clean negative space to imply focus.
hero.mood: Precise, collaborative, confident — purposeful choreography between operator and studio.
hero.alt: Operator and studio lead at pop-up table framed by narrowing light bands suggesting timing.

signal_map.structure: Overhead abstract geometry: concentric rings and connecting arcs, nodes on a lattice; top-down angle, textured matte paper and brushed-metal pins as materials.
elements: S3 node — discount → partner‑funded cashback path
paths and tokens indicating cohort flow and measurement windows
signal_map.motion: Arcs flow from S1 outward to S2 and S3, with a looping return to S1 representing 8‑week cohort follow; implied pulsing along arcs to indicate timing without literal clocks.
signal_map.palette: Muted winter palette: charcoal, warm gold, cool slate; materials: matte paper, soft satin ribbon, brushed aluminum pins.
signal_map.alt: Abstract signal map overhead: arcs link opening-weekend, outreach, cashback, micro-rebate nodes.
